content.detailedDescription:
@ 9 p.M. in venice, california 6 red/orange lights were viewed in two triangle formations over the sea from abbot kinney and venice blvd less than a mile inland. when the lights were first noticed my 5 friends and i felt that the streetlights seemed to glow a little brighter. i called my friend and he viewed 4 lights with houses obscuring the others but 3 of the red/orange lights he viewed were in a triangular formation. from both locations the lights were viewed for a few minutes until they slowly disappeared one by one. from the first location which was closer to the occurrence the streetlights flickered out as the last one disappeared. both parties were free of mind altering substances. 

a video on youtube from moscow on feb of 2011 shows a very similar phenomenon.
content.summary: 6 lights form two triangles

content.detailedDescription:
While in backyard smoking, witness saw three bright lights approaching from southeast.  witness is an aircraft enthusiast and recognizes aircraft lighting configurations.  initially, lights appeared to be possible landing lights on an aircraft, but as the lights drew closer, witness saw that there were actually three lights, and that they were glowing orbs not attached to a visible structured craft.  as the lights drew even  closer, they made a turn toward the east, and witness then saw that the rearward side of the bottom light was illuminated with red light, so that the bottom orb was half white and half red.  because of treetops obscuring view, witness could not determine if the turn was an abrupt, angular turn, or an arching turn, but no banking maneuver was observed during the turn.  altitude estimated at 1000 to 1500 feet. lighted orbs were very close together, so witness could not discern any structure connecting or supporting the orbs, however they maintained the same relative position and proximity to one another during the observed flyover.

witness further stated that the following evening at approximately the same time, a 737 or similar aircraft approached and followed nearly the same path.  this is unusual since the location is far from any major airports, and any large comercial aircraft would be flying over much higher than 2000 feet.  witness could not discern tail markings on the aircraft, but normal passenger jet windows appeared to be present with all the shades drawn.  witness was of the opinion that the jet was flying unusually slow and did not appear to have its wing flaps down, which would be expected at a relatively slow airspeed.
content.summary: Three glowing white orbs arranged in a verticle column approached, then turned

content.detailedDescription: Driving down route 61, heading into pottsville, pa. glanced up and saw what appeared to be a round shere shaped metalic object ascend over the tumbling run mtn. at first i tought it must have been a helium ballon but then i thought from the distance i saw it, it would have had to been a very large ballon. the incident only lasted a few seconds as it dissappeared over the mountain.
content.summary: Saw object ascend over mountain.

content.detailedDescription: This all happened from 12 midnight to 4 a.M. outside in my back yard. looking north toward the bookcliff mountains a strange light brighter than any surrounding stars began to decend straight down in a slow movement. when out of sight i began to look around in the sky for the object or any thing else. i saw a bright light pulse on in an area of the sky were there was no stars, very bright. it went out after about 2 to 3 seconds and then repeated this again. after going out the second time there was a fast streak of light from left to right in a very straight line. the streak was short and very fast. in this area is a very dull but noticable object. i had to focus on stars in the sky away from object to see the glimmer out of the corner of my eye. about 10 minutes later i see a huge what seemed to be a search light in the direction of this dull object. i could not tell wether it was being pointed at this object or from the object, but it went from one side of the sky to the other. then i seen alot of other slow moving objects moving across the sky, change directions in the direction of the dull object, then dissappear. i have seen shooting stars and what they move like, these were not natural. the movement was very uniform and intelligent. i've never seen shooting stars change direction and control speed. all the activity is in one portion of the sky around this dull object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights above sky in grand junction colorado may 20, 2012 in the a.M

content.detailedDescription: This all happened from 12 midnight to 4 a.M. outside in my back yard. looking north toward the bookcliff mountains a strange light brighter than any surrounding stars began to decend straight down in a slow movement. when out of sight i began to look around in the sky for the object or any thing else. i saw a bright light pulse on in an area of the sky were there was no stars, very bright. it went out after about 2 to 3 seconds and then repeated this again. after going out the second time there was a fast streak of light from left to right in a very straight line. the streak was short and very fast. in this area is a very dull but noticable object. i had to focus on stars in the sky away from object to see the glimmer out of the corner of my eye. about 10 minutes later i see a huge what seemed to be a search light in the direction of this dull object. i could not tell wether it was being pointed at this object or from the object, but it went from one side of the sky to the other. then i seen alot of other slow moving objects moving across the sky, change directions in the direction of the dull object, then dissappear. i have seen shooting stars and what they move like, these were not natural. the movement was very uniform and intelligent. i've never seen shooting stars change direction and control speed. all the activity is in one portion of the sky around this dull object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights above sky in grand junction colorado may 20, 2012 in the a.M

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking up the hill to the parking lot entrance of the fred meyer store on on ne 67th avenue, three blocks from my house. when i got to the top i noticed a blinking/pulsating orange light approaching from the south/ southwest and i watched it thinking at first it was an airplane. i then saw that it was large, bright, globe-shaped, and pulsating slowly rather than blinking. the globe was at least 500 ft. elevation, possibly as much as 2000 ft., it was hard to tell how large the craft was. it appeared to my vision as basketball sized or a little larger at the elevation it was flying. i watched it as it flew over my head, heading northeast. when it was directly over my head the craft ascended slowly up through the cloud cover disappearing to my view. as soon as that one ascended i saw two others, identical to the first flying close together along the same exact path, they also ascended slowly as they reached the same zenith. i was observing this alone. there was some activity closer to the store entrance, a clerk collecting shopping carts and a couple of people parking their cars, but no one in my immediate vicinity. i sent out a mental communication asking who the operators of the craft were and did not receive a reply, telepathically or otherwise. 

at the same time as my sighting a small airplane flew over heading due east. i thought that they would have also been able to see the pulsating globular craft if they looked down. i looked that airplane up on the webtrak database that is used by the noise management office of the port of portland and got the identity: flight id: n214lm tail number: n214lm aircraft type: pa 44 altitude: 6,198 ft. origin: hio according to the database the plane had departed for the hillsboro airport. the plane made the usual airplane noise not too loud at the elevation it was flying. in contrast to the plane, the orange pulsating globes were completely silent.

my feelings and reaction: i was very surprised to be seeing this in the middle of a well lit area in the city. the previous times i have sighted such craft i was out in the country where there were no street lights. these other sightings were in the late 1970's and early 1980's in marin county california and southampton, new york. those times the craft were much further away and hovered before racing away on a diagonal. this time they were so much closer, but there were still no exterior characteristics or details visible on the craft, just the pulsating light. i have been studying a lot of books with translations from ancient sumerian tablets and texts so i wanted to know if these are annunaki, pleiadians, or other visitors and was disappointed not to have gotten any communication. i was too busy observing to want to get out my cellphone to try to take pictures. after the sighting i continued up to the store, couldn't find what i wanted, got a rain check, did not speak to the clerk about what i'd seen, and walked home. on my way home i called a close friend who said something about ball lightening. i knew that wasn't it, especially when i watched some videos of ball lightening which is erratic and random. these craft were on a trajectory and moving slowly, pulsating rhythmically. i also called two other friends, one of whom said he had also been getting calls about sightings from friends in ohio and arizona.
content.summary: 3 pulsating, orange-lit globe-shaped craft headed slowly in a northeast direction, one in front and two more flying close together following it.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a group of five ufos last night. they were like nothing else i've ever seen. strange yellow-orange glowing orbs. i was standing in my backyard about 10:30 p.M. near 71st and glisan in portland. when i saw the first one, it caught my eye because it was moving slowly from the west towards me. and i thought that's a weird helicopter. but there was no sound. it meandered north, then suddenly picked up speed and disappeared.
 
then from the southwest, two more flying slowly one behind the other. the first one suddenly rose up and stopped, and the other one came up to it. then they slowly followed the same path as the first one. then two more, doing pretty much the same. they were not planes ... planes don't stop in mid-air. and not helicopters because they can't go as fast as these did when they accelerated. they had no flashing lights like normal aircraft. and there was no noise at all. even with a high-up plane you can hear something. and these weren't even that high up, probably 5,000 feet. i couldn't see any shapes, just a glowing lights.

someone else reported seeing this from the nearby fred meyers parking lot last night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Five glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: It was may 20,2012, around 1:28. me and my stepson was outside taking pictures and i just happen to look upward with the camera and seen this object near the sun. i thought it maybe the moon. so i looked again and said the moon is not that color in the day, nor night. i showed the picture to my girlfreind and she said it was nonsense. so i go back outside again and look and i see the same object on the otherside of the sun. "very strange" i said.  i have an iphone 3gs that has an otto case on it. so thinking that may have something to do with it, i took it off. still the same. so now im on the deck of the mobile home in front and look up in the same place and i see two objects, side by side. im thinking"wow!" it was amazing.The two obects just stayed there. when i came back outside and looked up, they were gone.
content.summary: Was outside taking pictures and looked up. seen one object first, the looked around seen other object

content.detailedDescription: It was approx. 10:30 pm saturday may 19 2012. my father in law and i were having a cigarette in my backyard. he noticed it 1st. he pointed and said look at that. we couldn't explain what it was. it wasn't a jet or a plane or a helicopter. we were baffled. it was a glowing orange circular orb like object. it made no sound at all. it seemed to be brighter on the bottom and and glowing on the top all orange. almost like a hot air balloon. not sure if they fly at night or not? but it moved to fast across the sky to be a hot air balloon. it moved across the sky from left to right (west to east) in a straight line at about the height a helicopter would fly. not to high. there was no engine sound at all. strangely quiet. it only lasted about 20 seconds and then vanished over the horizon.
content.summary: Orange orb over ottawa ontario canada

content.detailedDescription:
It was late at night and me and my friends were playing tackle football out in his yard, i look up and i see this object that has lights that blink in an order around the object (three lights, yellow red and bluish green) me and my friends have seen it at my house at night also. but it happens when im outside a night or in the house. the lights made me notice the object then the moving straight path it flew in. i thought at the moment the first time i saw it, airplane but the lights went all the way around it,so i thought,ufo.
the object moved in one path under cloudcover and in plain sight, i could only see lights that went all the way around it. it followed me anywhere when im outside at night. i feel, scared, afraid, curious, and want to uncover the mystery of what this is and prove whether or not extra terrestrial life is real. the object stayed in sight then increased speed then disappeared as soon as everyone of us locked onto the object.
content.summary: Standing outside, late night, see it everywhere i go at night, blinking lights, stays in straight path

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along a dark country road and noticed a red orange glowing in the sky above moving my direction. i reached a round-about and there were no other vehicles coming, so i stopped to get out and listen for sound and to observe the object closer. it was moving at a steady pace at maybe 200-300 feet above me and as it traveled over me and moved away started to turn more red. looking at it as it passed over, it appeared to have a flame inside of a ball look to the light. when i saw that another car was coming, i got in my vehicle, moved it around the round-about and pulled over to continue observing it. it slowly moved out of sight, not changing direction or speed. i didn't get the sense that the object was very big, it probably disappeared from view in a couple of miles. my feeling was that it was something unusual but still can not think of what it might have been.
content.summary: Orange red fireball moving steadly over my vehicle. i stopped get out of car to observe.

content.detailedDescription: Was laying on the couch last night when the dog started barking at the sliding glass door. i got up to see what he was barking at and saw 5 basketball size orange orbs floating in the back yard above the water and moving slowly from north to south. after they got out of range more followed, all in the same path moving slowly from north to south. i live in the outer banks of north carolina which is a small sandbar on the east coast. these objects were on the sound right behind my house. after around 20 minutes or so they stopped coming. a couple got really close and we could see what looked like spot lights slowly spinning and looking around down into the water and around the sky. i got kind of nervous at this but they didn't land or anything all all ended up disapearing to the south.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Group of 5 orange spheres flew over my house followed by 6 individuals in 2 min incriments

content.detailedDescription: Was a late night of netflix viewing and i decided i wanted to go outside and see if i might see anything. i had an overwhelming urge to do this earlier in the evening but the mosquitoes were much to obnoxious. around 3:36 am i spotted the first one, very dim, pulsating to a brighter light, moving very slowly north to south. the light would dim out completely and i tried to anticipate where it might reappear. it did this about 3-4 times and then picked up a great deal of speed, faster than a plane, left no tail like a meteor and was gone. i was facing east at this time and it had been nearly overhead, i couldn't even begin to guess the altitude.  so, this peeked my interest and i decided to stay out a bit longer. facing west now, about 20 minutes later, i see a second light that seems to be lower in altitude and and pulsing in a similar fashion as the earlier one, heading north to south. i lost this one pretty quickly but was surprised to see a third light almost as soon as i lost the second, this one was also traveling north to south, pulsing but not going completely out. also of note, if the second light was about 70 degrees from the horizon, then this third light was at about 80 degrees. as i said, i saw the third light almost as soon as i lost the second light, so they must have entered my line of sight at almost the same time, one slightly further back from the other. the third light did begin to arc slightly west and i finally lost it. i stayed out a bit longer, hoping for a better show, but got nothing. well, that wraps it up. happy hunting.
content.summary: From 3:36 am till about 4:10 am witnessed 3 unidentified pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: I walked out my front door with my fiance and noticed it was a clear night with lots of stars. we sat on our step and i noticed 3 flashing red light above us it moved extremely quick they were kind of in the shape of a v. we kept watching the sky and saw a few shooting stars and then all of a sudden these bright orangey colored balls came from out of no where in a straight line above us. we only say them for 30 seconds or so but then they disappeared behind our house. there was 6 balls length wise in a row and they seemed very evenly spaced out. my fiance ran to the back but they were gone. i felt freaked out and scared he was extremely excited because all his life he wanted to see something like that. a few minutes later we were out back and saw 3 white lights width wise and they came from the same direction as the orange balls came over our house stayed there for a few seconds and vanished into the night sky. we then saw a helicopter flying around the area im not sure if he had anything to do with the sightings or not.
content.summary: 6 large orangey yellow red balls moved over us!

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home about 10 pm last night when i noticed people outside watching what i thought was the eclipse. my husband said he saw it too and described it as being two circles in the sky. all of a sudden i saw it and it looked like two fireballs in the sky. one was higher and one was lower. they were spaced apart from each other. within a few minutes they appeared to fade away.
content.summary: 2 fireballs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: This is my 2nd sighting of the very same object i saw in aug. of 2011.  i was driving down i75 coming home from my nieces birthday party up north.  it was myself and my 2 children (at that time ages 5 and 7)  it was raining outside and thundering and lightning.  i reached bay city and was passing the rv store that is on the right of the highway (if you're going south on i75) when i saw the object.  it was the same dull dark grey rectangle with red lights that i had seen previously.  it seemed to be right overhead.  i only saw it for a couple of seconds as i was driving on the busy highway and it was raining.  it was so low i had to lower my head to look out and up thru my window to do a double take.  it was just there in a cloud and then it went back in the cloud and i was too far ahead and could't look back.  had i not had my kids i would have pulled over right there on the highway and got out to look.  i yelled at my kids to look that i was seeing the same thing i saw on the boat that day and my son was sitting on the far side of the car and couldn't see over, but my daughter saw it.  she said she saw something grey with red lights.  she says the lights were flashing but i never saw them flash.  i was also traveling approx 75mph.  i am very interested to know what these sightings are and hope anyone else who might have seen the same thing report it.
content.summary: Dark grey rectangle object w/red lights witnessed in the clouds on a stormy day

content.detailedDescription: Tonight may 20th 2012 around 2:30 am i ryan gradwell was out messing around with an electric rc car out front of my building when i saw a flash of something in the north east sky, i saw around 6 or 7 stars in the ne sky that were clumped together and then i saw the flash again but it was much bigger then the twinkle of a star at 1st i thought ok well it must have been the death of a star then i saw 1 of the clumped stars move close to another star and stop then i knew it was no dying star so i continued watching just below the clumped stars that big flash kept appearing and disappearing around 5000-10,000 ft  from surface within the area below the clumped stars. i then noticed this blue and red dull shinning orb about 200 ft from the tree line east of my position hovering silently with very few flashes of white light  i focused on the large flashing as it seemed to be flashing toward me very fast i became very light headed and dizzy my cat was completely on edge and i had went in to get a witness only to have that person watch for 2min then gave up and went inside i then went inside but it seems that there is major activity with u.F.O.'s in my area every night there is helicopters flying at all hours of the night i have questioned about it and was told it is the only time the police can practice training... so they must either be really slow learners or they are training every cop in the world because i hear and see them constantly training every night for almost a year now some 2-3 at once lasting threw till the next day actually i can hear 1 now so i guess there training hours have been extended .... right!
content.summary: Group of hovering stars all moving then a big flash as 1 appeared close to the earth then almost 300ft away it flashed again an traveld in a forward motion above me with blue red orb 300 ft in treeline

content.detailedDescription:
My friend onie and i were outside at approx. 9:30 and i noticed what looked like a japanese floating candle in the distance.  i took notice because of the brightness of the object. 

when i saw the second one appear over the horizon, i alerted onie to the ufo's.  he immediately repeated that i thought they were (japapnese floating candles) but at this point, they were moving pretty fast, linear and they were not blinking. 

as they passed directly overhead, the deep amber orange was very noticeable.  i watched them fade into the night sky.  

from a rational perspective, they did not feel 'otherworldly' they seemed man made.  had they moved at strange angles i may have concluded 'alien' however, definitely unidentified.  

no photos or videos were captured but i speak the truth and i have a witness.  

thank you
content.summary: Two orange orbs moving linear pass directly over my house and my friend witnessed it

content.detailedDescription: It was approx the middle of august 2011.  my family and i were on our boat going down the saginaw river heading towards the bay.  it was extemely foggy out and also there were thick clouds in the sky.  we reached the mouth of the bay and the fog started to clear out in the water but was still heavy on the shore.  i was looking at the fog line when all of a sudden i saw something move in the fog/clouds.  it moved in and out of the fog/clouds and appeared to be hovering but moving slighty back and forth.  it was a dull metallic dark grey rectangle object.  i could see what i thought to be red lights on it.  we were approx. 500ft from the shore but i could see it plain as day peeking out of the fog/cloud cover and then going back in.  i watched it for as long as i could see it.  i told my husband to look and he was busy driving the boat and either didn't hear me (our boat is loud) or just didn't look.  i told my kids to look but they were young (then 5 and 6)and they didn't see it.  (this was the 1st time i saw this object, the 2nd time - which i will post also - my daughter - then 7 yrs old did see it.)  i didn't know what it was then and still don't know what it is now.  i only decided to post my stories (the 2nd one to follow) after i read someone in ann arbor saw what i think to be the same thing in march of 2012.  i believe in aliens and ufo's and was very excited to actually have seen what i saw.  whether it really is aliens or just some "weather balloon" which it could be (you never know) i would love to find out.
content.summary: Rectangle grey metallic ufo w/red lights hovering in the clouds/fog over the mouth to the saginaw bay

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2:34 a.M., i left my home to go to the convenience store located at the corner of mcmahon blvd and unser. while driving on mcmahon (descending) toward unser at approximately 40 mph, i saw a bright object that appeared to be a meteor or other large object descending across the sky from my right to left, in what appeared to be a northeasterly direction. as i was descending from a higher elevation, i could see the entire city below, as well as the eastern skyline. the object appeared unusually large for a meteor, and it had two distinct colors (electric blue and white). trailing the object was what appeared to be a long white tail. i contacted local media and as of 6 a.M., they had not received additional reports. in all probability, the object was a meteor, small comet, or a large piece of space junk falling to earth. the object was definitely not an aircraft. the electric blue/white colors of the object were reminiscent to the effect of a nuclear explosion on the night sky i witnessed as a child in the early 1950s. 
i was very surprised that there were no other reports filed as the object was quite large and anyone looking easterly over the city couldn't miss it.
i am filing this report for the record and, hopefully, there is an official record of the object somewhere.
content.summary: Large glowing object with tail decended over city.

content.detailedDescription: Very bright pulsating irregularlary red light moved back and forth ins sky then disappeared into clouds
content.summary: Very bright pulsating irregularlary red light moved back and forth ins sky then disappeared into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Take a lay back at a skate park after a run.  the sky was clear above where i live, sarnia.  there were fireworks in the sky earlier in the evening, when i went out for my run.  

after about 5km i walked myself down to a calm and decided i deserved a little love and lay down a domed skate/bike park cement hill.  looking upward at a clear night sky.  there wasn't much going on up there.  a little surprised there were no planes that i could see.  i was looking directly west upward laying on a slope about 45 degrees.  i could half the sky in front of me.  looking to my left (south) i saw what looked like two stars, i thought they moved for a second, so i referenced them against a local object and figured i would look back to see if they were moving.  
 
then something caught my eye, what i had thought was venus earlier, a orange star like light was moving across the sky from the south side of my view towards the north.  i watched it for a few seconds figuring if it was a satellite or a plane.  i have seen satellites before they are more dim, move a lot slower, and i have never seen an orange one.  i then realized the light was moving across the sky extremely quickly.  about a degree a second at what i would guess to be between 500ft - 1mi  or higher.  ( it faded from view a couple of times and returned to view in the same straight line path, not sure if there was some cloud way up there, but the stars were not obscured, in any obvious way. )  not sure about it's dimming and becoming more visible.  i was more astonished at the speed.  the direction was straight south to north, unwavering straight path.  entire viewing was less than one minute.  

the time of the viewing is very close 10:46 est.  after seeing it fade out, i was a little stunned, thought about reporting it, and then thought to check the time.  it was 10:48pm, i estimate about two minutes after i saw it.

it is likely that other people saw it, like me doing, some after fireworks star gazing.
content.summary: Viewed small orange light, (thought was star / venus ), looked back it was moving south to north across sky.  very fast.  much faster than any airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
May 19, 2012 ��� 9:47 pm observation location is in atascosa county, on the corner of fm 2504 and garden drive. this location is between the township of rossville, texas (2.75 miles to the east) and the city of devine, texas (7.3 miles to the north east). 

i was in my truck facing south on garden drive about to make a right turn onto fm 2504 when i looked straight up into the night sky and noticed a ball of white light about four times the size of venus as we see it now. the light was coming down from the stars and emitted, exploded or pushed the outer atmosphere into a huge and very bright ring of light the size of my fist at arm���s length. it looked like the same kind of entry as filmed over xiao shan airport in hangzhou, china on july 7, 2010.

the bright ring lasted a few seconds but the white light that came into the atmosphere continued on a southward flight path. below and maybe, five to six miles behind the white light came the nightly 9:45pmish passenger jet airliner at around 15,000 to 18,000 feet agl. 

the pilots of the jet liner had to have seen the bright white light for it would have been at their 11:30 and only a few miles in front of them.
the white light dimed as it continued its flight south and the passenger plane veered off more to their right. i could not tell if the passenger plane���s right course correction was due to the white light or just a normal course correction to laredo direction.

possible passenger airliner is a dallas-fort worth (dfw) to laredo (lrd) american airlines 3363 operated by /american eagle, embraer rj145, which depart at 8:55pm to arrive 10:15pm. 

need to research and find all the flights that fly over nightly south bound though the atascosa county airspace at 9:45 pm.
content.summary: Spectacular upper earth atmosphere entry

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 friends were having a smoke on the balcony of my apartment, and observed a redish orange light moving from what seemed to be above the hone bridge, to the left, and we watched the object for 3 minutes move across the sky, randomly becoming darker and lighter.
content.summary: Redish orange light, moving with precision horizontally across sky

content.detailedDescription: My sister, husband and 2 kids took a walk around the neighborhood. we all of a sudden seen 8 or so red/orange odd shapped objects in the sky. this intrigued us so we tried to walk in the direction they were coming from. all of a sudden they were gone. vanished in thin air. so we kept walking and then a few more poped up and were shooting up fast and then would just float down. they all came from the same directing. the ground! not sure what they were but my husband has been in the military and says he has never seen anything like what we seen. thought my eyes were playing tricks on me until my 2 year old nephew said " look guys" see and pointed up! too bad none of us had our phones on us so no pictures.
content.summary: 8 or so red/orange lights shoot up and then vanish

content.detailedDescription: I was in the bathroom , which was unlit, and saw a slow moving brite orange object to the north! so i quickly ran to my 2nd floor deck to find 5 or 6 more comming up through the tree line from the east.  thought i was seeing a plane at first , but lite was different than anyplane i've ever seen, i live near two airports and know my planes.I thought rite away ufo. i've lived here for 44 yrs and never seen anything like it! at first i was a little scared but became worried when i had seen how many there was!I saw the objects for approx 10 min! then they flew out of sight.
content.summary: 12 or more brite orange objects(i hav video)from east to west

content.detailedDescription: I like to get great sunset pictures,from the florida coast,so every night at the beach house i would go up on top to the viewing area to watch the sunset,to see if it would be a memorable one or not . this particular evening,(i think it was wed.Evening,but it might have been another night (the date and time should be part of the digital info however) any way as i was looking north west to watch for the sun set,an object which appeared to be a black orb,with a flaming bottom streaked over my head from out over the gulf,headed inland . i pointed my camera at it,and zoomed the lens,and snapped a picture,before the object was beyond my sight. there was no sound at all . i have no idea how high the object was,but it appeared to be about airplane height .
content.summary: I was on top of beach house watching sun set,when an object streeked over my head . i took a picture.

content.detailedDescription: The object was comming towards me( south to north ) then turned gaining altitude and disaperied with in a few seconds. in between the pulses i could see a object.
content.summary: Glowing object with pulsating light

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my house, having just finished watching a tv show. my wife stepped out side to the front yard to smoke a ciggarette, when she comes in to have me see the light she noticed. icame outside to see a small, star-like light; orange in appearance over the mountain (little cottonwood). moving slightly faster than a plane would at that distance. i smelled what seemed to be wood burning, but saw no flickering of fire in the mountain. (some of us in the nieghborhood have fire-pits, so it may not be connected. i included it here for posterities sake.) the light was below the partial cloud cover, with no discernable outline.It flickered with a random pattern. i grabbed my phone to take video of it, but the object did not show up on my screen. (this would be from low resolution on my phone.) i used 7x50 binoculars to watch the object change course (a gradual curve from north-south to west.) where it then disappeared. 2-3 minutes later, the same (or very similar) object reappeared in the original place, travelling the same speed and course. at this point, i noticed a second object with a white glow from the origin point. i used my google sky app on my phone to ascertain it was a star (i forgot the star name.) we checked utah fire warch to see if there was a fire on one of the mountains in that direction, thinking it may have been a fire-plane partially obscured by smoke, but there wasn't.) 
  my feelings/reactions were curiosity, and i wanted to get as much detailed information as i could. i have been interested in ufology for over 20 years, so i had some basic idea of what info would be needed, and how to get it if possible.
  i feel this may have been a plane, but the lights did not flash, but rather flickered in a random pattern, also i have never seen planes with orange lights.
  i lost sight of the object when it stopped flickering. the outline could not be found through the binoculars either. both sightings ended the same way.
content.summary: Nocturnal lights, orange randomly flickering. over mountain, smell of fire (wood), 1 or 2, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Approximatly 9:30am walked outside to go to work when i noticed alot of chemtrails in sky, ran back in house to get camera and started to take pictures. i always take double shots so these are only a few seconds apart.
content.summary: Taking pictures fo chemtrails
